techniques.name: Dangun, the legendary founder of Gojoseon
Won-Hyo, the monk who introduced Buddhism to Silla
Yi I, Confucian scholar, writer, and Korean philosopher

full: Ready Posture: Parallel Ready Stance facing towards D.
Move the left foot to B forming a left walking stance toward B while executing a low block to B with the left forearm. (Gunnun so palmok najunde makgi)
Move the right foot to B forming a right walking stance toward B while executing a middle punch to B with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to A, turning clockwise to form a right walking stance toward A while executing a low block to A with the right forearm. (Gunnun so palmok najunde makgi)
Move the left foot to A forming a left walking stance toward A while executing a middle punch to A with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a low block to D with the left forearm. (Gunnun so palmok najunde makgi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to C turning clockwise to form a right walking stance toward C while executing a low block to C with the right forearm. (Gunnun so palmok najunde makgi)
Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to A forming a right L-stance toward A while executing a middle block to A with the left inner forearm. (Niunja so anpalmok kaunde yop makgi)
Move the right foot to A forming a right walking stance toward A while executing a middle punch to A with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to B turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward B while executing a middle block to B with the right inner forearm. (Niunja so anpalmok kaunde yop makgi)
Move the left foot to B forming a left walking stance toward B while executing a middle punch to B with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to C forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle block to C with the left inner forearm. (Niunja so anpalmok kaunde yop makgi)
Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to D turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle block to D with the right inner forearm. (Niunja so anpalmok kaunde yop makgi)
Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to C forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to C forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
END: Bring the left foot back to a ready posture.
Ready Posture: Parallel Ready Stance facing towards D.
Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B, at the same time executing a middle guarding block to B with a knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi)
Move the right foot to B forming a right walking stance toward B while executing a high punch to B with the right fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to A turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward A, at the same time executing a middle guarding block to A with a knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi)
Move the left foot to A forming a left walking stance toward A while executing a high punch to A with the left fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a low block to D with the left forearm. (Gunnun so palmok najunde makgi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high punch to D with the right fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a high punch to D with the left fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high punch to D with the right fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to E, turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward E while executing a twin forearm block to E. (Niunja so sang palmok makgi)
Move the right foot to E forming a right walking stance toward E while executing a high punch to E with the right fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to F turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward F while executing a twin forearm block to F. (Niunja so sang palmok makgi)
Move the left foot to F forming a left walking stance toward F while executing a high punch to F with the left fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a low block to C with the left forearm. (Gunnun so palmok najunde makgi)
Execute a rising block with the left forearm, maintaining the left walking stance toward C. (Gunnun so palmok chookyo makgi) Perform 13 and 14 in a continuous motion.
Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a rising block with the right forearm. (Gunnun so palmok chookyo makgi)
Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a rising block with the left forearm. (Gunnun so palmok chookyo makgi)
Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a rising block with the right forearm. (Gunnun so palmok chookyo makgi)
Move the left foot to B turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward B while executing a middle outward strike to B with the left knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi)
Move the right foot to B forming a right walking stance toward B while executing a high punch to B with the right fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
Move the right foot to A turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward A while executing a middle outward strike to A with the right knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde bakuro taerigi)
Move the left foot to A forming a left walking stance toward A while executing a high punch to A with the left fist. (Gunnun so nopunde jirugi)
END: Bring the left foot back to a ready posture.
Ready Posture: Parallel Ready Stance facing towards D.
Move the left foot to B, forming a left walking stance toward B while executing a high side block to B with the left outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi)
Execute a middle punch to B with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward B. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)

Move the left foot on line AB, and then turn clockwise to form a right walking stance toward A while executing a high side block to A with the right outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi)
Execute a middle punch to A with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward A. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)
Move the left foot to D, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the right straight fingertip. (Gunnun so sun sonkut kaunde tulgi)

Twist the right knife-hand and torso counter-clockwise until the palm faces down. Step the left foot to D, turning counter-clockwise into a left walking stance toward D, and execute a high side strike to D with the left back fist. (Jappyosul tae, gunnun so dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high side strike to D with the right back fist. (Gunnun so dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi)

Move the left foot to E, turning counter clockwise to form a left walking stance toward E while executing a high side block to E with the left outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi)
Execute a middle punch to E with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward E. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)

Move the left foot on line EF, and then turn clockwise to form a right walking stance toward F while executing a high side block to F with the right outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi)
Execute a middle punch to F with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward F. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)
Move the left foot to CE forming a left walking stance toward CE, at the same time executing a high wedging block to CE with the outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde hechyo makgi)
Execute a middle front snap kick to CE with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 13. (Kaunde apcha busigi)
Lower the right foot to CE forming a right walking stance toward CE while executing a middle punch to CE with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde baro jirugi)
Execute a middle punch to CE with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward CE. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi) Perform 15 and 16 in a fast motion.
Move the right foot to CF forming a right walking stance toward CF while executing a high wedging block to CF with the outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde hechyo makgi)
Execute a middle front snap kick to CF with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 17. (Kaunde apcha busigi)
Lower the left foot to CF forming a left walking stance toward CF while executing a middle punch to CF with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde baro jirugi)
Execute a middle punch to CF with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward CF. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi) Perform 19 and 20 in a fast motion.
Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a rising block with the left forearm. (Gunnun so palmok chookyo makgi)
Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a rising block with the right forearm. (Gunnun so palmok chookyo makgi)
Move the left foot to B, turning counter clockwise to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle side strike to B with the left knife-hand. (Annun so wen sonkal kaunde yop taerigi)

Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle side strike to A with the right knife-hand. (Annun so orun sonkal kaunde yop taerigi)
END: Bring the right foot back to a ready posture.
Ready Posture: Close Ready Stance A facing towards D.
Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B while executing a twin forearm block. (Niunja so sang palmok makgi)

Execute a high inward strike to B with the right knife-hand while bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder, maintaining a right L-stance toward B. (Niunja so sonkal nopunde anuro taerigi)
Execute a middle punch to B with the left fist while forming a left fixed stance toward B, slipping the left foot to B. (Gojung so kaunde yop jirugi)
Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A, forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a twin forearm block. (Niunja so sang palmok makgi)

Execute a high inward strike to A with the left knife-hand while bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder, maintaining a left L-stance toward A. (Niunja so sonkal nopunde anuro taerigi)
Execute a middle punch to A with the right fist while forming a right fixed stance toward A, slipping the right foot to A. (Gojung so kaunde yop jirugi)
Bring the right foot to the left foot and then turn the face toward D while forming a right bending ready stance A toward D. (Guburyo junbi sogi A)
Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the left foot. (Kaunde yopcha jirugi)
Lower the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi)
Move the right foot to D forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a guarding block to D with a knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi)
Move the left foot to D forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand. (Niunja so sonkal kaunde daebi makgi)
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle thrust to D with the right straight fingertip. (Gunnun so sun sonkut kaunde tulgi)
Move the left foot to E turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward E, at the same time executing a twin forearm block. (Niunja so sang palmok makgi)

Execute a high inward strike to E with the right knife-hand while bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder, maintaining a right L-stance toward E. (Niunja so sonkal nopunde anuro taerigi)
Execute a middle punch to E with the left fist while forming a left fixed stance toward E, slipping the left foot to E. (Gojung so kaunde yop jirugi)
Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to F, forming a left L-stance toward F while executing a twin forearm block. (Niunja so sang palmok makgi)

Execute a high inward strike to F with the left knife-hand while bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder, maintaining a left L-stance toward F. (Niunja so sonkal nopunde anuro taerigi)
Execute a middle punch to F with the right fist while forming a right fixed stance toward F, slipping the right foot to F. (Gojung so kaunde yop jirugi)

Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a circular block to CF with the right inner forearm. (Gunnun so anpalmok dollimyo makgi)
Execute a low front snap kick to C with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 19. (Najunde apcha busigi)
Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)
Execute a circular block to CE with the left inner forearm while maintaining a right walking stance toward C. (Gunnun so anpalmok dollimyo makgi)
Execute a low front snap kick to C with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 22. (Najunde apcha busigi)
Lower the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a middle punch to C with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)
Turn the face toward C forming a left bending ready stance A toward C. (Guburyo junbi sogi A)
Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot. (Kaunde yopcha jirugi)

Lower the right foot on line CD and then move the left foot to B, turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward B, at the same time executing a middle guarding block to B with the forearm. (Niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi)

Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a middle guarding block to A with the forearm. (Niunja so palmok kaunde daebi makgi)
END: Bring the right foot back to a ready posture.
Ready Posture: Parallel Ready Stance facing towards D.
Move the left foot to B forming a sitting stance toward D while extending the left fist to D horizontally. (Annun sogi)
Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. (Annun so orun joomuk kaunde ap jirugi)
Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. (Annun so wen joomuk kaunde ap jirugi) Perform 2 and 3 in a fast motion.
Bring the left foot to the right foot and then move the right foot to A forming a sitting stance toward D while extending the right fist to D horizontally. (Annun sogi)
Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. (Annun so wen joomuk kaunde ap jirugi)
Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. (Annun so orun joomuk kaunde ap jirugi) Perform 5 and 6 in a fast motion.
Move the right foot to AD forming a right walking stance toward AD while executing a middle side block to AD with the right inner forearm. (Gunnun so anpalmok kaunde yop makgi)
Execute a low front snap kick to AD with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 7. (Najunde apcha busigi)
Lower the left foot to AD forming a left walking stance toward AD while executing a middle punch to AD with the left fist. (Gunnun so kaunde baro jirugi)
Execute a middle punch to AD with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward AD. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi) Perform 9 and 10 in a fast motion.
Move the left foot to BD forming a left walking stance toward BD at the same time executing a middle side block to BD with the left inner forearm. (Gunnun so anpalmok kaunde yop makgi)
Execute a low front snap kick to BD with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 11. (Najunde apcha busigi)
Lower the right foot to BD forming a right walking stance toward BD while executing a middle punch to BD with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde baro jirugi)
Execute a middle punch to BD with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward BD. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi) Perform 13 and 14 in a fast motion.
Execute a middle hooking block to D with the right palm while forming a right walking stance toward D, pivoting with the left foot. (Gunnun so sonbadak kaunde golcho makgi)
Execute a middle hooking block to D with the left palm while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. (Gunnun so sonbadak kaunde bandae golcho makgi)
Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. (Gunnun so kaunde baro jirugi) Perform 16 and 17 in a connecting motion.
Move the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle hooking block to D with the left palm. (Gunnun so sonbadak kaunde golcho makgi)
Execute a middle hooking block to D with the right palm while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. (Gunnun so sonbadak kaunde bandae golcho makgi)
Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. (Gunnun so kaunde baro jirugi) Perform 19 and 20 in a connecting motion.
Move the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D at the same time executing a middle punch to D with the right fist. (Gunnun so kaunde jirugi)
Turn the face toward D forming a right bending ready stance A toward D. (Guburyo junbi sogi A)
Execute a middle side piercing kick to D with the left foot. (Kaunde yopcha jirugi)
Lower the left foot to D forming a left walking stance toward D while striking the left palm with the right front elbow. (Gunnun so ap palkup bandae taerigi)
Turn the face toward C forming a left bending ready stance A toward C. (Guburyo junbi sogi A)
Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot. (Kaunde yopcha jirugi)
Lower the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while striking the right palm with the left front elbow. (Gunnun so ap palkup bandae taerigi)
Move the left foot to E forming a right L-stance toward E while executing a twin knife-hand block. (Niunja so sang sonkal makgi)
Move the right foot to E forming a right walking stance toward E while executing a middle thrust to E with the right straight finger tip. (Gunnun so sun sonkut kaunde tulgi)
Move the right foot to F turning clockwise to form a left L-stance toward F while executing a twin knife-hand block. (Niunja so sang sonkal makgi)
Move the left foot to F forming a left walking stance toward F while executing a middle thrust to F with the left straight finger tip. (Gunnun so sun sonkut kaunde tulgi)
Move the left foot to C forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a high side block to C with the left outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi)
Execute a middle punch to C with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward C. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)
Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high side block to C with the right outer forearm. (Gunnun so bakat palmok nopunde yop makgi)
Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward C. (Gunnun so kaunde bandae jirugi)
Jump to C forming a left X-stance toward B while executing a high side strike to C with the left back fist. (Twigi, wen kyocha so dung joomuk nopunde yop taerigi)
Move the right foot to A forming a right walking stance toward A at the same time executing a high block to A with the right double forearm. (Gunnun so doo palmok nopunde makgi)

Bring the right foot to the left foot and then move the left foot to B forming a left walking stance toward B while executing a high block to B with the left double forearm. (Gunnun so doo palmok nopunde makgi)
END: Bring the left foot back to a ready posture.
